body:
Output before this PR:
```console
$ spack log-parse $(spack location -i hdf5@1.10.4)/.spack/build.out
0 errors
==> Error: max() arg is an empty sequence
```
and after this PR:
```console
$ spack log-parse $(spack location -i hdf5@1.10.4)/.spack/build.out
0 errors

```
title: Fixed an issue occurring when no error lines are found
